body.p: An entity shall retain the presentation and classification of items in the financial statements from one period to the next unless:

li.p: it is apparent, following a significant change in the nature of the entity’s operations or a review of its financial statements, that another presentation or classification would be more appropriate having regard to the criteria for the selection and application of accounting policies in IAS 8; or
an IFRS requires a change in presentation.
